name: Human Inc
description: Human Inc is an innovation house helping businesses thrive through innovation, culture, and future skills. Partnering with 100+ global brands like Citibank and AirAsia, they've launched 200+ products, delivered exceptional customer experiences, and certified over 15,000 design thinkers and agile leaders, driving customer-centric growth and organizational agility.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We help companies and people win through innovation, culture & future skills
ShortDescription: Customers Are Human. Organisations Should Be Too.

Highlights.name: Deliver Customer-Centric Innovation
Highlights.description: Power teams to quickly build products and services that customers love.

Highlights.name: Accelerate Transformation
Highlights.description: Leverage organisational culture to drive people change, technology adoption & business growth.

Highlights.name: Develop Future-ready Talent
Highlights.description: Train certified Design Thinkers and Agile Leaders with Human Inc Academy.

enhanced_description: Human Inc is an innovation house that helps businesses thrive by fostering innovation, cultivating strong organizational culture, and developing future-ready skills. They have partnered with over 100 global brands, including Citibank and AirAsia, demonstrating their extensive reach and capability. With a track record of launching over 200 products and delivering exceptional customer experiences, Human Inc empowers teams to quickly build products and services that customers love. Through their Human Inc Academy, they have certified over 15,000 design thinkers and agile leaders, driving customer-centric growth and organizational agility. They also specialize in accelerating transformation by leveraging organizational culture to drive people change, technology adoption, and overall business growth.
competitive_advantages: Extensive global client base (100+ global brands including Citibank and AirAsia)
Proven track record in product development (200+ products launched)
Large-scale talent certification (15,000+ design thinkers and agile leaders certified)
roi_benefits: Enhances leadership capabilities (Design Thinking and Agile)
